data.title: The Continuing Story of the Banning and Censoring of the Bible
data.meta_description: The banning and censoring of the Bible has a long and multifaceted history that continues to this day, and although it is not typically included within popular lists of banned books, it is safe to assert that the Bible is the most banned and censored book in history.Â  In this article, I will attempt not so much to chronicle the specific details of this history as to consider the broad categories of censorship that have appeared through the ages and to look at specific biblical passages that are problematic to authorities that have banned and censored the Bible.
